hero.description: Press a shortcut, talk, and the AI-corrected transcript lands right where your cursor was. Translate into 100+ languages on the fly.

featureHighlight.label: AI-Powered Accuracy
featureHighlight.heading: Your words, but better.
featureHighlight.description: Voca doesn't just transcribe — it understands context. Mispronunciations and grammar mistakes are corrected, then the result is auto-pasted wherever you were typing. Developer tone turns "reakt" into React and "nahbar" into navbar.
highlights: Translate transcripts into 100+ languages in one click
Developer tone keeps technical terms in English
Numeric add-on converts spoken numbers to digits
Planning add-on turns dictated steps into clean lists

numberedFeatures.heading: Everything you need, nothing you don't.
numberedFeatures.description: From recording to polished, translated text — Voca handles the entire pipeline on your desktop.

features.title: One Shortcut, Done
features.description: Press a key, speak, press again. The transcript is copied and pasted right where your cursor was — no switching apps, no extra steps.

features.title: Choose Your STT Engine
features.description: Switch between Deepgram Nova-3 and Groq Whisper with a single click. 35+ languages supported for voice recognition with automatic language detection.

features.title: Translate Into 100+ Languages
features.description: Context-aware translation with tone control. Pick formal, casual, or developer mode — technical terms stay in English, jargon gets auto-corrected.

features.title: Open Source & Private
features.description: Fully open source under MIT. Audio is processed through your own API keys — no data collection, no analytics, no third-party servers storing your recordings.

pricing.heading: Affordable plans, all features included.
pricing.description: Both plans unlock every feature. No hidden fees, no surprises — pick the one that fits your usage and start transcribing.

finalCta.heading: Press a key, speak, done.
finalCta.description: One shortcut to transcribe, correct, translate, and paste — all without leaving your app. Open source and works on macOS & Windows.
